akn:section.akn:heading: Persons entitled to file a record.

akn:content.akn:p: A person may file an initial financing statement, amendment that adds collateral covered by a financing statement, or amendment that adds a debtor to a financing statement only if:
By authenticating or becoming bound as debtor by a security agreement, a debtor or new debtor authorizes the filing of an initial financing statement, and an amendment, covering:

By acquiring collateral in which a security interest or agricultural lien continues under ยง 28:9-315(a)(1), a debtor authorizes the filing of an initial financing statement, and an amendment, covering the collateral and property that becomes collateral under ยง 28:9-315(a)(2).
A person may file an amendment other than an amendment that adds collateral covered by a financing statement or an amendment that adds a debtor to a financing statement only if:
If there is more than one secured party of record for a financing statement, each secured party of record may authorize the filing of an amendment under subsection (d).
